downloadTitle: System Center 2022 Integration Pack for System Center 2022 Service Manager
downloadDescription: The integration pack for System Center - Service Manager is an add-in for System Center 2022 Orchestrator. It enables you to use Service Manager to coordinate and use operational data in an existing IT environment comprised of service desk systems, configuration management systems, and event monitoring systems.
systemRequirementsSection:
• System Center 2022 - Orchestrator
  • System Center 2022 - Service Manager
  • Windows Server 2019 or higher
  • .NET Framework 4.0 or higher (.NET 4.7.2 recommended)
  • RAM – minimum 1GB (recommended 2GB)
  • Disk space minimum 200MB
  • CPU Dual Core or better
installInstructionSection: Ensure that SCSM console is deployed before installing Integration pack. Then download the .oip file, register the Integration Pack in Deployment Manager and deploy the Integration Pack on Runbook Designer and Runbook Server.
